dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: Not yet, but I’ll have it by tomorrow.

question: Has B completed the report?
answer: No, B has not completed the report yet.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: Are you coming to the party tonight?

dialogue.speaker: B

question: Will B attend the party?
answer: No, B will not attend because they have to work late.
